mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(delivery_sequence), 0) FROM ROUTE WHERE region_idx = #{regionIdx}

SELECT f.franchise_name, c.common_code_name, r.delivery_sequence, f.franchise_idx FROM FRANCHISE f JOIN COMMON_CODE c ON c.common_code_idx = f.region_idx JOIN ROUTE r ON f.franchise_idx = r.franchise_idx ORDER BY c.common_code_name , delivery_sequence
